#summary The contenteditable attribute specifies whether the element is editable.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-microsoft

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [DivElement <div> element] > *contenteditable attribute*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `true`
  * `false`

== Elements ==

You can use the `contenteditable` attribute on any element.
